mapper.select: /* common.getCommonCodeList() */ SELECT M.code, M.codeName, M.description, M.parentCode, M.isUsed, M.dispOrder, M.creationDate, M.modificationDate FROM CommonCode M LEFT OUTER JOIN CommonCode P on M.parentCode = P.code ORDER BY IF(ISNULL(P.dispOrder), M.dispOrder, P.dispOrder), M.dispOrder
